    • java.lang.Thread

    public class ServerPlayer
extends java.lang.Thread

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerPlayer

        public ServerPlayer(ServerGame game,
            java.net.Socket socket,
            PieceColor color)
        Constructor for the server player. Assigns all variables and sends a PieceColor to the player connection.
        Parameters:
        game - - Game object used to send messages to the other player.
        socket - - Connection used for messages.
        color - - PieceColor linked to this player.
